collectible.title: Turandot's Chair
collectible.subtitle: Because thrones are hard to move
collectible.text: The chair appears to be regal, imposing, and adorned in the finest fabric. It is quite firm at first, almost uncomfortable to sit in despite its beauty. However, upon spending more time together, you find it to be more soft and giving than you expected. Perhaps with some hard work and patience you and her... I mean, you and the chair, might form a mutual bond.

collectible.title: Crocodile Plushie
collectible.subtitle: Snuggled to death
collectible.text: His name is King, and he loves you. He's the perfect friend to cuddle with after a long hard day at work. He'll listen to all of your problems, awkward jokes, and hot takes without judgement. He is fully prepared to fight someone to the death in your name. He likes belly rubs.
collectible.unlock: Listen to Turandot talk after she finishes.
